main event: A glowing, plate-shaped object was sighted over Little Falls, New Jersey on May 15, 1955.
interesting points: The object was estimated to be 75 to 100 feet in diameter and emitted a yellowish-white glow.
The object moved slowly and hovered, with no sound detected.
The sighting lasted for over 20 minutes, as the object traveled across the horizon.
A sudden beam of light from the right side of the observer initially drew their attention to the object.
The observer was described as a 32-year-old, highly reliable telephone engineer.
photographs: No photographs were included in the report
